title: Sound blaster audigy SE original install CD
description:
This is the original driver CD for Creative's Sound Blaster Audigy SE. Model SB0570

The Audigy SE was a budget model with no hardware acceleration.
However, the install CD includes the famous Creative Wavestudio 6.20.13 where you can record "What U hear" (meaning anything that comes from you speakers) and save it as a MP3 file.

With Windows 7 and newer this sadly stopped working. But later with Daniel K's excellent Windows 7+ drivers, Audigy cards could return to newer windows systems.

The problem I now had was to install Creative Wavestudio again. The shitty part is the installer need the actual hardware to do its job.
I tried to install it manually using universal extractor, but then "save as mp3" option is missing. I included the deviceID and hardware description, hope it might be some help.


So if you don't have the actual hardware, windows XP 32 (or lower) or have the hacker skills to bypass hardware check, this torrent is useless for you.  

Myself I'm a happy user of Wavestudio in windows 7 64 with a well-soundning Audigy 2 ZS!
